name: RCLike.wInner_cWeight_eq_smul_wInner_one
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
E : ι → Type u_4
inst✝³ : Fintype ι
inst✝² : RCLike 𝕜
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → SeminormedAddCommGroup (E i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → InnerProductSpace 𝕜 (E i)
f g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner RCLike.cWeight f g) (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv ↑(Fintype.card ι)) (RCLike.wInner 1 f g))
decl:
lemma wInner_cWeight_eq_smul_wInner_one (f g : ∀ i, E i) :
    ⟪f, g⟫ₙ_[𝕜] = (Fintype.card ι : ℚ≥0)⁻¹ • ⟪f, g⟫_[𝕜] := by
  simp [wInner, smul_sum, ← NNRat.cast_smul_eq_nnqsmul ℝ]

name: RCLike.conj_wInner_symm
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
E : ι → Type u_4
inst✝³ : Fintype ι
inst✝² : RCLike 𝕜
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → SeminormedAddCommGroup (E i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → InnerProductSpace 𝕜 (E i)
w : ι → Real
f g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq ((starRingEnd 𝕜) (RCLike.wInner w f g)) (RCLike.wInner w g f)
decl:
@[simp] lemma conj_wInner_symm (w : ι → ℝ) (f g : ∀ i, E i) :
    conj ⟪f, g⟫_[𝕜, w] = ⟪g, f⟫_[𝕜, w] := by
  simp [wInner, map_sum, inner_conj_symm, rclike_simps]

g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner w 0 g) 0
decl: @[simp] lemma wInner_zero_left (w : ι → ℝ) (g : ∀ i, E i) : ⟪0, g⟫_[𝕜, w] = 0 := by simp [wInner]

f₁ f₂ g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner w (HAdd.hAdd f₁ f₂) g) (HAdd.hAdd (RCLike.wInner w f₁ g) (RCLike.wInner w f₂ g))
decl:
lemma wInner_add_left (w : ι → ℝ) (f₁ f₂ g : ∀ i, E i) :
    ⟪f₁ + f₂, g⟫_[𝕜, w] = ⟪f₁, g⟫_[𝕜, w] + ⟪f₂, g⟫_[𝕜, w] := by
  simp [wInner, inner_add_left, smul_add, sum_add_distrib]

⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner w f (HAdd.hAdd g₁ g₂)) (HAdd.hAdd (RCLike.wInner w f g₁) (RCLike.wInner w f g₂))

  simp [wInner, inner_add_right, smul_add, sum_add_distrib]

f₁ f₂ g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner w (HSub.hSub f₁ f₂) g) (HSub.hSub (RCLike.wInner w f₁ g) (RCLike.wInner w f₂ g))
decl:
lemma wInner_sub_left (w : ι → ℝ) (f₁ f₂ g : ∀ i, E i) :

⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner w f g) 0
decl:

  simp [Subsingleton.elim f 0]

name: RCLike.wInner_smul_left
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
E : ι → Type u_4
inst✝¹⁰ : Fintype ι
inst✝⁹ : RCLike 𝕜
inst✝⁸ : (i : ι) → SeminormedAddCommGroup (E i)
inst✝⁷ : (i : ι) → InnerProductSpace 𝕜 (E i)
𝕝 : Type u_5
inst✝⁶ : CommSemiring 𝕝
inst✝⁵ : StarRing 𝕝
inst✝⁴ : Algebra 𝕝 𝕜
inst✝³ : StarModule 𝕝 𝕜
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real 𝕝 𝕜
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Module 𝕝 (E i)
inst✝ : ∀ (i : ι), IsScalarTower 𝕝 𝕜 (E i)
c : 𝕝
w : ι → Real
f g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner w (HSMul.hSMul c f) g) (HSMul.hSMul (Star.star c) (RCLike.wInner w f g))
decl:
lemma wInner_smul_left {𝕝 : Type*} [CommSemiring 𝕝] [StarRing 𝕝] [Algebra 𝕝 𝕜] [StarModule 𝕝 𝕜]
    [SMulCommClass ℝ 𝕝 𝕜] [∀ i, Module 𝕝 (E i)] [∀ i, IsScalarTower 𝕝 𝕜 (E i)] (c : 𝕝)
    (w : ι → ℝ) (f g : ∀ i, E i) : ⟪c • f, g⟫_[𝕜, w] = star c • ⟪f, g⟫_[𝕜, w] := by
  simp_rw [wInner, Pi.smul_apply, inner_smul_left_eq_star_smul, starRingEnd_apply, smul_sum,
    smul_comm (w _)]

name: RCLike.wInner_smul_right
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
E : ι → Type u_4
inst✝¹⁰ : Fintype ι
inst✝⁹ : RCLike 𝕜
inst✝⁸ : (i : ι) → SeminormedAddCommGroup (E i)
inst✝⁷ : (i : ι) → InnerProductSpace 𝕜 (E i)
𝕝 : Type u_5
inst✝⁶ : CommSemiring 𝕝
inst✝⁵ : StarRing 𝕝
inst✝⁴ : Algebra 𝕝 𝕜
inst✝³ : StarModule 𝕝 𝕜
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real 𝕝 𝕜
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Module 𝕝 (E i)
inst✝ : ∀ (i : ι), IsScalarTower 𝕝 𝕜 (E i)
c : 𝕝
w : ι → Real
f g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner w f (HSMul.hSMul c g)) (HSMul.hSMul c (RCLike.wInner w f g))
decl:
lemma wInner_smul_right {𝕝 : Type*} [CommSemiring 𝕝] [StarRing 𝕝] [Algebra 𝕝 𝕜] [StarModule 𝕝 𝕜]
    [SMulCommClass ℝ 𝕝 𝕜] [∀ i, Module 𝕝 (E i)] [∀ i, IsScalarTower 𝕝 𝕜 (E i)] (c : 𝕝)
    (w : ι → ℝ) (f g : ∀ i, E i) : ⟪f, c • g⟫_[𝕜, w] = c • ⟪f, g⟫_[𝕜, w] := by
  simp_rw [wInner, Pi.smul_apply, inner_smul_right_eq_smul, smul_sum, smul_comm]

name: RCLike.mul_wInner_left
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
E : ι → Type u_4
inst✝³ : Fintype ι
inst✝² : RCLike 𝕜
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → SeminormedAddCommGroup (E i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → InnerProductSpace 𝕜 (E i)
c : 𝕜
w : ι → Real
f g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul c (RCLike.wInner w f g)) (RCLike.wInner w (HSMul.hSMul (Star.star c) f) g)
decl:
lemma mul_wInner_left (c : 𝕜) (w : ι → ℝ) (f g : ∀ i, E i) :
    c * ⟪f, g⟫_[𝕜, w] = ⟪star c • f, g⟫_[𝕜, w] := by rw [wInner_smul_left, star_star, smul_eq_mul]

name: RCLike.wInner_one_eq_sum
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
E : ι → Type u_4
inst✝³ : Fintype ι
inst✝² : RCLike 𝕜
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → SeminormedAddCommGroup (E i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → InnerProductSpace 𝕜 (E i)
f g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner 1 f g) (Finset.univ.sum fun i => Inner.inner (f i) (g i))
decl: lemma wInner_one_eq_sum (f g : ∀ i, E i) : ⟪f, g⟫_[𝕜] = ∑ i, inner (f i) (g i) := by simp [wInner]

name: RCLike.wInner_cWeight_eq_expect
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
E : ι → Type u_4
inst✝³ : Fintype ι
inst✝² : RCLike 𝕜
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → SeminormedAddCommGroup (E i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → InnerProductSpace 𝕜 (E i)
f g : (i : ι) → E i
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner RCLike.cWeight f g) (Finset.univ.expect fun i => Inner.inner (f i) (g i))
decl:
lemma wInner_cWeight_eq_expect (f g : ∀ i, E i) : ⟪f, g⟫ₙ_[𝕜] = 𝔼 i, inner (f i) (g i) := by
  simp [wInner, expect, smul_sum, ← NNRat.cast_smul_eq_nnqsmul ℝ]

name: RCLike.wInner_const_left
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
w : ι → Real
a : 𝕜
f : ι → 𝕜
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner w (Function.const ι a) f) (HMul.hMul ((starRingEnd 𝕜) a) (Finset.univ.sum fun i => HSMul.hSMul (w i) (f i)))
decl:
lemma wInner_const_left (a : 𝕜) (f : ι → 𝕜) :
    ⟪const _ a, f⟫_[𝕜, w] = conj a * ∑ i, w i • f i := by simp [wInner, const_apply, mul_sum]

name: RCLike.wInner_const_right
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
w : ι → Real
f : ι → 𝕜
a : 𝕜
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner w f (Function.const ι a)) (HMul.hMul (Finset.univ.sum fun i => HSMul.hSMul (w i) ((starRingEnd 𝕜) (f i))) a)
decl:
lemma wInner_const_right (f : ι → 𝕜) (a : 𝕜) :
    ⟪f, const _ a⟫_[𝕜, w] = (∑ i, w i • conj (f i)) * a := by simp [wInner, const_apply, sum_mul]

name: RCLike.wInner_one_const_left
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
a : 𝕜
f : ι → 𝕜
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner 1 (Function.const ι a) f) (HMul.hMul ((starRingEnd 𝕜) a) (Finset.univ.sum fun i => f i))
decl:
@[simp] lemma wInner_one_const_left (a : 𝕜) (f : ι → 𝕜) :
    ⟪const _ a, f⟫_[𝕜] = conj a * ∑ i, f i := by simp [wInner_one_eq_sum, mul_sum]

name: RCLike.wInner_one_const_right
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
f : ι → 𝕜
a : 𝕜
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner 1 f (Function.const ι a)) (HMul.hMul (Finset.univ.sum fun i => (starRingEnd 𝕜) (f i)) a)
decl:
@[simp] lemma wInner_one_const_right (f : ι → 𝕜) (a : 𝕜) :
    ⟪f, const _ a⟫_[𝕜] = (∑ i, conj (f i)) * a := by simp [wInner_one_eq_sum, sum_mul]

name: RCLike.wInner_cWeight_const_left
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
a : 𝕜
f : ι → 𝕜
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner RCLike.cWeight (Function.const ι a) f) (HMul.hMul ((starRingEnd 𝕜) a) (Finset.univ.expect fun i => f i))
decl:
@[simp] lemma wInner_cWeight_const_left (a : 𝕜) (f : ι → 𝕜) :
    ⟪const _ a, f⟫ₙ_[𝕜] = conj a * 𝔼 i, f i := by simp [wInner_cWeight_eq_expect, mul_expect]

name: RCLike.wInner_cWeight_const_right
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
f : ι → 𝕜
a : 𝕜
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner RCLike.cWeight f (Function.const ι a)) (HMul.hMul (Finset.univ.expect fun i => (starRingEnd 𝕜) (f i)) a)
decl:
@[simp] lemma wInner_cWeight_const_right (f : ι → 𝕜) (a : 𝕜) :
    ⟪f, const _ a⟫ₙ_[𝕜] = (𝔼 i, conj (f i)) * a := by simp [wInner_cWeight_eq_expect, expect_mul]

name: RCLike.wInner_one_eq_inner
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
f g : ι → 𝕜
⊢ Eq (RCLike.wInner 1 f g) (Inner.inner ((WithLp.equiv 2 (ι → 𝕜)).symm f) ((WithLp.equiv 2 (ι → 𝕜)).symm g))
decl:
lemma wInner_one_eq_inner (f g : ι → 𝕜) :
    ⟪f, g⟫_[𝕜, 1] = inner ((WithLp.equiv 2 _).symm f) ((WithLp.equiv 2 _).symm g) := by
  simp [wInner]

name: RCLike.inner_eq_wInner_one
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
f g : PiLp 2 fun _i => 𝕜
⊢ Eq (Inner.inner f g) (RCLike.wInner 1 ((WithLp.equiv 2 (ι → 𝕜)) f) ((WithLp.equiv 2 (ι → 𝕜)) g))
decl:
lemma inner_eq_wInner_one (f g : PiLp 2 fun _i : ι ↦ 𝕜) :
    inner f g = ⟪WithLp.equiv 2 _ f, WithLp.equiv 2 _ g⟫_[𝕜, 1] := by simp [wInner]

name: RCLike.linearIndependent_of_ne_zero_of_wInner_one_eq_zero
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
κ : Type u_2
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
f : κ → ι → 𝕜
hf : ∀ (k : κ), Ne (f k) 0
hinner : Pairwise fun k₁ k₂ => Eq (RCLike.wInner 1 (f k₁) (f k₂)) 0
⊢ LinearIndependent 𝕜 f
decl:
lemma linearIndependent_of_ne_zero_of_wInner_one_eq_zero {f : κ → ι → 𝕜} (hf : ∀ k, f k ≠ 0)
    (hinner : Pairwise fun k₁ k₂ ↦ ⟪f k₁, f k₂⟫_[𝕜] = 0) : LinearIndependent 𝕜 f := by
  simp_rw [wInner_one_eq_inner] at hinner
  have := linearIndependent_of_ne_zero_of_inner_eq_zero ?_ hinner
  exacts [this, hf]

name: RCLike.linearIndependent_of_ne_zero_of_wInner_cWeight_eq_zero
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
κ : Type u_2
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
f : κ → ι → 𝕜
hf : ∀ (k : κ), Ne (f k) 0
hinner : Pairwise fun k₁ k₂ => Eq (RCLike.wInner RCLike.cWeight (f k₁) (f k₂)) 0
⊢ LinearIndependent 𝕜 f
decl:
lemma linearIndependent_of_ne_zero_of_wInner_cWeight_eq_zero {f : κ → ι → 𝕜} (hf : ∀ k, f k ≠ 0)
    (hinner : Pairwise fun k₁ k₂ ↦ ⟪f k₁, f k₂⟫ₙ_[𝕜] = 0) : LinearIndependent 𝕜 f := by
  cases isEmpty_or_nonempty ι
  · have : IsEmpty κ := ⟨fun k ↦ hf k <| Subsingleton.elim ..⟩
    exact linearIndependent_empty_type
  · exact linearIndependent_of_ne_zero_of_wInner_one_eq_zero hf <| by
      simpa [wInner_cWeight_eq_smul_wInner_one, ← NNRat.cast_smul_eq_nnqsmul 𝕜] using hinner

name: RCLike.wInner_nonneg
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
w : ι → Real
f g : ι → 𝕜
hw : LE.le 0 w
hf : LE.le 0 f
hg : LE.le 0 g
⊢ LE.le 0 (RCLike.wInner w f g)
decl:
lemma wInner_nonneg (hw : 0 ≤ w) (hf : 0 ≤ f) (hg : 0 ≤ g) : 0 ≤ ⟪f, g⟫_[𝕜, w] :=
  sum_nonneg fun _ _ ↦ smul_nonneg (hw _) <| mul_nonneg (star_nonneg_iff.2 (hf _)) (hg _)

name: RCLike.norm_wInner_le
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Fintype ι
inst✝ : RCLike 𝕜
w : ι → Real
f g : ι → 𝕜
hw : LE.le 0 w
⊢ LE.le (Norm.norm (RCLike.wInner w f g)) (RCLike.wInner w (fun i => Norm.norm (f i)) fun i => Norm.norm (g i))
decl:
lemma norm_wInner_le (hw : 0 ≤ w) : ‖⟪f, g⟫_[𝕜, w]‖ ≤ ⟪fun i ↦ ‖f i‖, fun i ↦ ‖g i‖⟫_[ℝ, w] :=
  (norm_sum_le ..).trans_eq <| sum_congr rfl fun i _ ↦ by
    simp [Algebra.smul_def, norm_mul, abs_of_nonneg (hw i)]

name: RCLike.abs_wInner_le
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
inst✝ : Fintype ι
w f g : ι → Real
hw : LE.le 0 w
⊢ LE.le (abs (RCLike.wInner w f g)) (RCLike.wInner w (abs f) (abs g))
decl:
lemma abs_wInner_le (hw : 0 ≤ w) : |⟪f, g⟫_[ℝ, w]| ≤ ⟪|f|, |g|⟫_[ℝ, w] := by
  simpa using norm_wInner_le (𝕜 := ℝ) hw
